trans-unit.source: Used to control how <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> data packets are transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制如何传输 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> 数据包。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions> class provides the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> properties to control how Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request packets are transmitted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>类提供<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>属性以控制 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回显请求数据包的传输方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A> property specifies the Time to Live for packets sent by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>属性指定发送的数据包生存时间<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类。

trans-unit.source: This value indicates the number of routing nodes that can forward a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> packet before it is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 此值指示路由可以转发的节点数<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>之前它将被丢弃的数据包。

trans-unit.source: Setting this option is useful if you want to test the number of forwards, also known as hops, are required to send a packet from a source computer to a destination computer.
trans-unit.target: 设置此选项很有用，如果你想要测试的转发数目，也称为跃点，需将数据包从源计算机发送到目标计算机。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> property controls whether data sent to a remote host can be divided into multiple packets.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>属性控制是否将数据发送到远程主机可以划分为多个数据包。

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if you want to test the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the routers and gateways used to transmit the packet.
trans-unit.target: 此选项非常有用，如果你想要测试的最大传输单元 (MTU) 的路由器和网关用于传输数据包。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions> class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> class returns instances of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions> via the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>类传递给<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply>类返回的实例<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>通过<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>，请参阅<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> classes to send an ICMP echo request to the host specified on the command line.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply>类发送 ICMP 回显请求在命令行上指定的主机。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties to new values before calling <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将属性设置为之前调用的新值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>或<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value greater than zero that specifies the number of times that the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> data packets can be forwarded.
trans-unit.target: 一个大于零的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> 数据包可被转发的次数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to prevent data sent to the remote host from being fragmented; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则禁止将发送到远程主机的数据分段；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> class and sets the Time to Live and fragmentation values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> 类的新实例，并设置生存时间和分段值。

trans-unit.source: The `ttl` parameter limits the number of routers and gateways that can forward the data.
trans-unit.target: `ttl`参数限制的路由器和网关，可以将其转发数据的数量。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for testing the length of the route between the local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 这是路由的用于测试的本地和远程计算机之间的长度。

trans-unit.source: The `dontFragment` parameter allows you to test the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the routers and gateways used to transmit the packet.
trans-unit.target: `dontFragment`参数使你可以测试的最大传输单元 (MTU) 的路由器和网关用于传输数据包。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor and displaying the new instance's property values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数并显示新实例属性值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ttl" /> is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ttl" /> 小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that controls fragmentation of the data sent to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值控制发送到远程主机的数据的分段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data cannot be sent in multiple packets; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能在多个数据包中发送数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applications use this property to control whether data sent to a remote host by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class can be divided into multiple packets.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用此属性可控制是否将数据发送到远程主机由<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类可以划分为多个数据包。

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if you want to test the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the routers and gateways used to transmit the packet.
trans-unit.target: 此选项非常有用，如果你想要测试的最大传输单元 (MTU) 的路由器和网关用于传输数据包。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the data sent to the remote host is larger then the MTU of a gateway or router between the sender and the remote host, the ping operation fails with status <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.PacketTooBig>.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`并且发送到远程主机的数据是更大，则网关或发件人和远程主机之间的路由器的 MTU，ping 操作失败并显示状态<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.PacketTooBig>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property using a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A> constructor, and then displaying the value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性使用的值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，并且然后显示值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of routing nodes that can forward the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> data before it is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在放弃 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> 数据之前可以转发该数据的路由节点数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the number of times the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> data packets can be forwarded.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping" /> 数据包可被转发的次数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 128.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 128。

trans-unit.source: As gateways and routers transmit packets through a network, they decrement the current Time-to-Live (TTL) value found in the packet header.
trans-unit.target: 网关和路由器传输数据包通过网络，因为它们递减数据包标头中找到的当前生存时间 (TTL) 值。

trans-unit.source: If the TTL value reaches zero, the packet is deemed undeliverable and is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TTL 值达到零时，数据包将被视为未送达，并且将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if you want to test the number of routers and gateways used to transmit the data.
trans-unit.target: 此选项非常有用，如果你想要测试路由器和网关用来传输数据的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property using a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A> constructor, and then displaying the value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性使用的值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，并且然后显示值。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 为设置操作指定的值小于或等于零。
